amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 118-362 to require an annual report to Congress on the number of individuals found to be inadmissible and deportable each year as a result of the underlying bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
